name: Webdevly
overview:
Webdev.ly is an agile web & mobile development & design firm in Atlanta, GA which serves both the local Atlanta area as well as international businesses operating within the US and Europe. The firm focuses on customized web app development & design for mid to enterprise level businesses. With over a decade of collective experience within the company, Webdev.ly provides a comprehensive online solution for businesses seeking a competitive presence on the web.

Some of the services offered are corporate web design, custom web app development, mobile app development, web design services, eCommerce development, web project management, organic SEO, and Google AdWords PPC campaign optimization & management. Webdev.ly is partnered with Google as a Google Engage agency, as well as Google Adwords certified.
